body:
it's currently running, so might still have some bugs. should fix #23298 (for everyone who can't use #23307).

The checks for conflicts are also whacky but I was mainly concernced with making it run. If anyone would still integrate this, I can fix it up (as well as make sure it passes CI)
title: [hacky/draft] change concretization to respect repo-selection for non-primary-repos in envs
